about_the_game:
*** is a small game.
It is easy to play,hope you find surprise and happyness in the game.

And I will metain and expand this game until I have no goods to do with it.

The game is not a popular game type,i hope you enjoy this game.


In this game,you will deal with many puzzles,from easy to very hard to pass through. Every puzzles commonly in their own room.The room has only one door that ony can be open by passing the puzzle in the room.The puzzles made of a full system,it's good for people especially for children.Nothing adult content in the game.

Characters


Player

Who will pass through many puzzles and open many doors,to find out secrets in the game world,get rewards and may finally get the truth of the maze.


Features

- Very easy to play. What you need to do is switch on the right switch to open the door.

- All puzzles based on a mechanism system.

- 36+ puzzles.

- Only need a mouse to play the game.

And I will metain and expand this game until I have no goods to do with it.

The game is not a popular game type,i hope you enjoy this game.


In this game,you will deal with many puzzles,from easy to very hard to pass through. Every puzzles commonly in their own room.The room has only one door that ony can be open by passing the puzzle in the room.The puzzles made of a full system,it's good for people especially for children.Nothing adult content in the game.

Characters


Player

Who will pass through many puzzles and open many doors,to find out secrets in the game world,get rewards and may finally get the truth of the maze.


Features

- Very easy to play. What you need to do is switch on the right switch to open the door.

- All puzzles based on a mechanism system.

- 36+ puzzles.

- Only need a mouse to play the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WinXP/2003/Vista/7/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.7GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 8600GT / ATI HD2400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On board audio card
  • Additional Notes: -
